product_name: Bolle Quasar Snow Goggles - Fire Orange - 2013 Closeout
long_description: Outfitted with a precision spherical lens, the Fire Orange Quasar snow goggles increase terrain contrast and definition for better visibility and performance in moderate to flat lighting.
short_description: Outfitted with a precision spherical lens, the Fire Orange Quasar snow goggles increase terrain contrast and definition for better visibility and performance in moderate to flat lighting.
